name: Rasternauts
description:
A pixel perfect way of life is under threat when a scientific experiment gone wrong uncovers a new dimension composed entirely of vectors! Run, jump and shoot your way through the enemy landscape to save your bitmapped buddies, hold back the vector invasion, and save all of raster kind!

Features

  • Over 40 levels across 5 worlds
  • 7 playable characters, each with their own unique weapon
  • Four difficulty levels
  • Joypad, Keyboard, and Keyboard+Mouse control schemes
  • Classic platform-shooter action

Originally released on Xbox Live Indie Games, Rasternauts is now Pay What You Want on Windows. Enjoy!
